question: Which of the following is incorrectly paired with its function?
option1: Small intestine - enzymatic digestion of lipids, proteins and polysaccharides
option2: Oesophagus - transports food from the mouth to the stomach
option3: Large intestine - chemical breakdown of undigested starch, fats and amino acids
option4: Stomach - mechanical and chemical digestion of food
answer: Large intestine - chemical breakdown of undigested starch, fats and amino acids
